casebody.data:
Tommie MCMULLEN, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
CITIZENS INSURANCE COMPANY and Travelers Insurance Company, Defendants,
and
Farmers Insurance Exchange, Defendant/Cross-Plaintiff-Appellee,
and
Markel Insurance Company, Defendant/Cross-Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156167
COA: 332373 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 21, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for miscellaneous relief is GRANTED. The application for leave to appeal the June 13, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
